meta.author: JMMC OiDB Working Group
meta.note: Pay attention to change modules/config.xqm with sql configuration variables: config:sql-driver, config:sql-url, config:sql-username, config:sql-password and config:sql-table with tap endpoint : config:TAP_SYNC using a given property file (see build.xml for detail)

ul.li: First public release hosting public data
